newsitem.title: JAPAN: LTCB says sees the end of bad loan write-offs.
newsitem.headline: LTCB says sees the end of bad loan write-offs.

text.p: The Long-Term Credit Bank of Japan Ltd (LTCB) said on Monday that it could now see the end of its bad loan write-offs.

"We now can see the end of bad loan write-offs. From now on, we will use our operating profit and, if conditions allow, unrealised profit on our stock holdings (to write off bad loans)," a bank official told a news conference.
The bank forecast an operating profit of 150 billion yen for the full business year to March 31, 1997, the official said.
